humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, both sentinel lymph nodes (Part 2 and Part 3) and the non-sentinel lymph node (Part 4) are negative for tumor (0/1). The report also mentions that cytokeratin (AE1/3) stains confirm the negative status of the sentinel lymph nodes. Based on the rules provided, N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes (New Rule 10) or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma (New Rule 11). Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that sentinel lymph nodes #1, #2, and a non-sentinel lymph node from the right axilla were all negative for tumor (0/1). Additionally, cytokeratin (AE1/3) stains confirmed the negative status of the sentinel lymph nodes. Based on this information, the patient's pathologic N stage is N0 (no regional lymph node metastasis).
